description: In CMS Made Simple (CMSMS) before 2.2.10, an authenticated user can achieve SQL Injection in class.showtime2_data.php via the functions _updateshow (parameter show_id), _inputshow (parameter show_id), _Getshowinfo (parameter show_id), _Getpictureinfo (parameter picture_id), _AdjustNameSeq (parameter shownumber), _Updatepicture (parameter picture_id), and _Deletepicture (parameter picture_id).
